issue.title: [Java] [Dev] `docker-compose pull debian-java` fails
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-7536](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7536). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
I get the following error here:
```Java

$ docker-compose pull debian-java
Pulling debian-java ... error

ERROR: for debian-java  manifest for apache/arrow-dev:amd64-debian-9-java-8-maven-3.5.4 not found
ERROR: manifest for apache/arrow-dev:amd64-debian-9-java-8-maven-3.5.4 not found
```

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7536?focusedCommentId=17411192) by Krisztian Szucs (kszucs):*
It's not an issue anymore since ` archery docker run debian-java ` works as expected.
